quizzes.name: Game of Thrones
quizzes.quote: 'When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die. There is no middle ground.'

questions.question: What are the house words of House Stark?
choices: When the snows fall and the white winds blow, the lone wolf dies but the pack survives
The winters are hard, but the Starks will endure

questions.question: What is the name of Ned Stark's Valyrian greatsword?
Which of these names is not on Arya's list?
What are the house words of House Targaryen?
choices: All men must die, but we are not men

questions.question: What or who kills Khal Drogo in the end?
When Jon first meets Tyrion, what advice does Tyrion give him?
choices: “It’s not easy being drunk all the time. If it were easy, everyone would do it.”
“Never forget what you are, the rest of the world will not. Wear it like armor and it can never be used to hurt you.”
“It’s hard to put a leash on a dog once you’ve put a crown on its head.”
“A mind needs books like a sword needs a whetstone.”

questions.question: What are the house words of House Lannister?
choices: A Lannister always pays his debts
Teach them what it means to put a lion in a cage
When you play a game of thrones, you win or you die

quizzes.name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
quizzes.quote: 'In every generation there is a chosen one... she alone will stand against the vampires, the demons and the forces of darkness. She is the slayer.'

questions.question: Who is the first vampire that Buffy kills in the first episode, 'Welcome to the Hellmouth'?
What gift does Angel give Buffy for her 17th birthday?
In the episode 'Where the Wild Things Are', the gang goes to find Giles for help. They find him singing and playing guitar at the Espresso Bar. What song is he performing?
Xander tells Anya to dress up as something scary in the Halloween episode 'Fear, Itself'. What does she dress up as?
What name do Willow and Tara give their kitten?
What phrase is not on Buffy's tombstone?
choices: She saved the world a lot

questions.question: In the episode 'Restless', what does Tara warn Buffy?
What does Dawn get Tara for her birthday in the episode 'Family'?

quizzes.name: Parks and Rec
quizzes.quote: 'We need to remember what's important in life: friends, waffles, work. Or waffles, friends, work. Doesn't matter, but work is third.'

questions.question: What is the title of the book Leslie writes?
choices: Pawnee: The Greatest Town in America
Off the Sidelines: Raise Your Voice, Change the World

questions.question: What word and description appears at the very top of the Swanson Pyramid of Greatness?
choices: Capitalism - God's way of determining who is smart, and who is poor
Discipline - The ability to repeat a boring thing over and over
Buffets - Whenever available. Choose quantity over quality
Honor - If you need it defined, you don't have it

questions.question: Which of these is not one of Andy's own secrets he tells Ron after finding out about Duke Silver?
choices: 'I'm allergic to sushi. Every time I eat more than 80 pieces, I throw up'
'I don't know who Al Gore is and at this point I'm too afraid to ask'
'When they say 2% milk, I don't know what the other 98% is'
'I didn't actually sell my last car, I just forgot where I parked it'

questions.question: What superhero costume does Ben buy when Donna and Tom bring him along on their annual 'Treat Yo Self' day?
What is the only thing Ron hates more than lying?
What is April's favorite band?

quizzes.name: Twin Peaks
quizzes.quote: 'I have no idea where this will lead us. But I have a definite feeling it will be a place both wonderful and strange.'

questions.question: Who discovers Laura Palmer's body?
What is the name of Agent Cooper's secretary, who he addresses on most of his recordings?
What is the name of the diner Shelly works at?
What is Agent Cooper's favorite type of donut?
What is the Log Lady's real name?
